body:
FMPOV we can remove this component in any of the upcoming minor or major versions as it has never been public API anyway but merely a helper API for implementing command routing internally.

@dejanb @ctron @kaniyan WDYT?

In the [1.7.0 release review information](https://projects.eclipse.org/projects/iot.hono/releases/1.7.0/review), where we announced the deprecation of the Device Connection service, we actually indicated to remove it in Hono 2.0.0. So I guess we should better stick to that plan ...
Also to be removed here is the `forceCommandRerouting` parameter in `IntegrationTestSupport`.

issue.title: [#2818] Remove Device Connection service
issue.body:
This is for #2818:
Removes the deprecated Device Connection service.

Documentation changes will go in a follow-up PR.

Some refactorings concerning the still-used `client-device-connection-infinispan` module should follow as well.

issue.title: [#2818] Remove Device Connection service from documentation
